articles.description: Impressed with his show, former Australia and Kolkata Knight Riders pacer Brett Lee called the Indian "evergreen" and reckoned he will soon claim a fifer as the tournament proceeds.
articles.content: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) kicked-off the ongoing edition of the Indian Premier League (IPL) securing a resounding six-wicket win against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in the season opener. The team the… [+1713 chars]

articles.description: Mumbai Indians find themselves staring down the barrel, having lost seven consecutive matches in IPL 2022.

articles.title: Mike Tyson Pummeled "Aggressive" Flyer Over Water Bottle: Report - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Mike Tyson is known for his erratic behaviour - biting off a piece of Evander Holyfield's ear in a 1997 bout.
